Strings.Text: On the shelf are many unused \ncomputers.{pause}
It's a super computer which \nstores the records of the {pause}{clear}people living in this city.{pause}
It's a super computer which \nstores the records of the {pause}{clear}people living in this city.{pause}
Unwanted materials and supplies \nhave been thrown into the {pause}{clear}boxes.{pause}
There is no need to operate.{pause}
It's a control panel for the shield \nshutter.{pause}{clear}It is used for alarming \ntresspassers. A blue light is lit.{pause}{clear}To operate, you need a key plate.{pause}
Regina has returned to the patrol \nship with the girl.{delay 28712}
This box appears to be used for \nstoring important materials.{pause}{clear}A red light is lit. To open, you \nneed a key plate.{pause}
Nothing happened.{pause}{clear}This key plate is not the correct \none for this terminal.{pause}
This is the key plate which Dylan \nthrew out.{pause}
The shield shutter is in operation. \nOn the other side of the {pause}{clear}shutter is a shadow of a \nperson.{pause}
